term.title: mesogenic group

item.text: A part of a molecule or macromolecule endowed with sufficient anisotropy in both attractive and repulsive forces to contribute strongly to mesophase or, in particular, liquid-crystalmesophase formation in low-molar-mass and polymeric substances.

sources.item: PAC, 2002, 74, 493. 'Definitions of basic terms relating to polymer liquid crystals (IUPAC Recommendations 2001)' on page 497 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200274030493)
